Package src.exceptions

Exception Summary
BadScenarioFileException Exception thrown when there is an error parsing the scenario xml file.
CityNameExistsException Exception thrown when an attempt is made to make a new city, but the city name already exists.
EnemyDiedException Exception thrown when an enemy dies.
EnemySpawnNotDefinedException Exception that is thrown when the engine tries to spawn an enemy, but there are no enemies defined to spawn.
NoPlayerException Exception thrown when there is no player.
NoSuchCityException Exception thrown when the game tries to read from a city that does not exist.
PlayerEnteredException Exception class for if the player successfully enters a land object.
